infoText: Update v2.8.9 is complete and should be on the launcher shortly. Main fix is backing up to Ars Magica 2 v008 because of the potion effect issue.  Full changelog available at github or FTB forums.
Quick note, multiple mods updated finally (why the delay is an update) so make sure to check changelogs for more info.

Quick map update to fix mod item changes because of going back to previous version of ars, a few other changes were made to mods that added additional blocks, so please make sure to at least update your level.dat
Thank you for playing TolkienCraft II and please let me know if you have any questions or issues while playing!
